channel.title: Custom interface

item.title: Custom interface
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

I tried adding a donator interface, i changed the tab icon to donator icon. Then i made and added this to rsinterface: public static void overloadxTab(TextDrawingArea[] tda) { RSInterface rsi = addTabInterface(27620); addText(15053, "Sagi-X", tda, 2, 0xFF9900, false, true); addSprite(15054, 0, "Achieve/ACH"); addSprite(15055, 1, "Achieve/ACH"); addSprite(15056, 0, "Achieve/ACH"); addButton(27621, 3, "Achieve/BOX", "Killcount"); addTooltip(27640, "Full Killcount"); addButton(27622, 4, "Achieve/BOX", "Change your spellbook"); addTooltip(27642, "Switch spellbook"); addButton(27623, 5, "Achieve/BOX", "Donator Zone"); addTooltip(27644, "Teleport to Donator-Zone!"); addText(27624, "Information:", tda, 2, 0xFF981F, false, true); addSprite(27634, 0, "Achieve/LINE"); addText(27625, "Full Killcount:", tda, 2, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27647, "Get 25 Killcount", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27626, "INSTANT in Godwars", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27627, "To enter a chamber.", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27628, "Spellbook change:", tda, 2, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27629, "Change your Spellbook", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27630, "anywhere ingame", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27631, "but in the wilderness.", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27632, "Donator Zone:", tda, 2, 0xFF981F, false, true); addText(27633, "Has lots of good benefits.", tda, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true); int last = 21; int frame = 0; setChildren(last, rsi); /** Buttons + text */ setBounds(27621, 5, 5, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27622, 75, 5, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27623, 145, 5, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27635, 55, 235, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27636, 70, 240, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27634, 0, 62, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27624, 55, 46, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27625, 15, 65, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27647, 20, 80, frame, rsi);frame++; setBounds(27626, 20, 95, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27627, 20, 110, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27628, 15, 125, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27629, 20, 140, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27630, 20, 155, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27631, 20, 170, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27632, 15, 185, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27633, 20, 200, frame, rsi); frame++; /** Tooltips */ setBounds(27640, 10, 50, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27642, 30, 50, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27644, 35, 50, frame, rsi); frame++; setBounds(27648, 40, 240, frame, rsi); frame++;
Gave me no errors it was all fine, but then it didnt show? when you click the donator icon it is just like an empty inventory interface.
Anyone help??
